name: email-reader
description: A simple mockup of an email reader which uses React Router to handle routing

scripts.build: npm run-script clean && npm run-script mkdir && npm run-script build:html && npm run-script build:js
scripts.watch: npm run-script watch:html & npm run-script watch:js
scripts.watch:html: npm run-script build:html && chokidar ./src/index.html -c "npm run-script build:html"
